name: Danger Close! (itch) (TripWire)
description:
What is this game about?

Your base is under attack! Use the artillery turret to repel the waves of attacking foes. But you're not alone: a company of infantrymen are digging in to help you defend your base. However, the number of attacking enemies outnumber you almost 10 to 1! Do your best to reduce the number of attackers so the infantry company doesn't get overwhelmed. But be careful, your explosive shells will kill anyone caught in their blast!

What are the controls?

  • A & D | Left & Right arrow keys to aim
  • W & S | Up & Down arrow keys to adjust range
  • Space | Left Ctrl | Right Ctrl to fire
  • Escape to pause
  • Click on the radar view to move camera to position
  • Pan with left or right mouse button in main view
  • Use the GUI controls on the right side for rapid adjustments

Why was this game made?

This game was created as part of the raylib 5k gamejam.

Assets used

  • kenney.nl tower defense pack (Kenney • Tower Defense (top-down))
  • kenney.nl particle pack (Kenney • Particle Pack)
  • Sound effects and music obtained from https://www.zapsplat.com/
  • raylib library (https://www.raylib.com/)
